betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oEnergy collectors use light (glowstone is the best source) to generate equivalence, and to upgrade fuels.

The fuel upgrade sequence is: Charcoal, Redstone, Coal, Gunpowder, Glowstone, Alchemical Coal, Block of Redstone, Blaze Powder, Coal Block, Glowstone Block, Mobius Fuel, Alchemical Coal Block, Aeternalis Fuel, Mobius Fuel Block, Aeternalis Fuel Block
